name: Shadows of Dungeon
description:
Shadows of Dungeon is a Roguelike RPG. Choose a hero and start the journey! Pass through hordes of monsters to lead humanity to salvation! You have a long journey through unusual locations, improving skills and characters.

Random rooms and bosses! 

Travel through uniquely generated locations and defeat the monsters that live in the most hidden corners of the dungeon. Remember, the more you fight, the stronger you can become.

A variety of items and their combinations

In Shadows of Dungeon you can learn dozens of types of magic, combine them, and find the best one to pass the dungeon!

Improve your heroes and unlock new ones!

A variety of characters are provided in the game. Choose the best one and make your way through the dungeon. Upgrade to unlock new abilities and features!

Unlock classes, study your enemies, and stop at nothing. After all, darkness doesn't live forever.
